dimensions:
Warp: 128.5 cm (50 1/2 in.). Weft: 98.5 cm (38 3/4 in.)
Both selvedges present.
title: La Mort de Didon (The Death of Dido)
medium:
Medium: cotton  
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description: Scenes of people in classical dress illustrating a story from Virgil's Aeneid that inspired two operas in eighteenth-century France.  Aeneas leaves Troy in flames carrying his father Anchises in his arms, Aeneas abandons Dido who then kills herself, and Aeneas kills Turmus. In red on white.
name: Textile
